content: स्पष्ट {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [स्पश्-क्त नि° इडभावः] {@--1@} Distinctly visible, evident, clearly perceived, clear, plain, manifest; स्पष्टे जाते प्रत्यूषे <ls>K.</ls> ‘when it was broad day-break’; स्पष्टाकृतिः <ls>R. 18. 30</ls>; स्पष्टार्थः &c. {@--2@} Real, true. {@--3@} Full-blown, expanded. {@--4@} One who sees clearly. --ष्टं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Clearly, distinctly, plainly. {@--2@} Openly, boldly. (स्पष्टीकृ means ‘to make clear or distinct, explain, elucidate.)
